mere doktar se usane kaaphee bahas kee aur mera opareshan kainsil kar mera dubaara pareekshan kiya gaya
jab kabhee dinacharya se vakt milata hai door baithe apane priyajanon kee yaad aa jaatee hai
javaan beta usaka bheetar hee bheetar khokhala ho raha hai use dekhakar usake chehare ko dekhakar use vishvaas nahee ho raha tha

kuchh samay pashchaat sabhee kee dinacharya vaisee hee ho jaegee jaisee thee
tumhaaree baat theek hai lekin jab rishte kee baat aaegee sabhee na kar denge

aakhir kya likhoon kaise likhoon na to unhen likh paatee hoon ki ve kaise hain unakee tabiyat kaisee hai na unhen saantvana de paatee hoon aur unakee sthiti aisee hai ki na kuchh apanee hee baat likhane ko man hota hai

abhee tak

yah kahakar arun ne usake gaalon ko thapathapaaya aur haath hataate hue bola chalo utho ab chenj kar lo
patr likhate samay usake dil kee dhadakan badh gaee thee
apana jeevan unhonne sanstha ko samarpit kar rakha tha
main man se dev ko chaahane lagee hoon
sab hans rahe the khilakhilaakar
tab kaheen vah so paaya
shabd na juta paee kuchh ekaek use saamane dekhakar
dev tha ki nity koshish karata tha aur aise mein vah usake ango ko sahala kar use shaant karane kee cheshta karata aur svayan bhee unheen bhaavon mein shaant ho jaata tha
lekin veena ne svatah hee apane shabd badal diye vah to main yoon hee kah gaee
haathapair sphoorti se bhar gae aur sabane haath uthaakar arun ka abhibhaadan kiya
vah naach kya raha tha jhoom raha tha
usakee patnee nimmee in ulajhanon ko door nahin kar paatee thee
subah mahasoos hua use ki dev usase phir lipata hua hai
jo kuchh usake saath pahale se ho chuka hai vah shaadee ke baad bhee to ho sakata tha
jab yah tay ho gaya tha ki ve ab parivaar sahit deharaadoon hee saital honge
vah bhaagaabhaaga dev ke kamare mein aaya
kisakis ko bataata apana kasht
aaeee
tumhen maan ka aasheesh
ab unhen prasann hee rakhane ka prayatn kiya karo
ab ghabaraane se kuchh nahin hoga
jaise kuchh yaad aaya unhen bolee  priya ke janmadin par amit ka kaard bhee aaya tha
vah purush nahee tha sirph tumhaare man ka chhalaava tha
lekin ekaek koee aisee baat ho jaatee hai ki prograam agale varsh par ja pahunchata hai
amit ne kaha
intarakaam ka batan dabaakar nars ko doosara mareej bhejane ko kah diya
na jaane kya nirnay le baithen
haan mujhase kahate ek saal mehanat karo
veena ne sahaj bhaav se utar diya
usake bhavishy ke baare mein bata doonga
barabas usakee aankhon se aansoo bah nikale
ladakee dekhane mein achchhee lag rahee thee
veena aur dev taiksee se utar ka pamp ke ophis mein gae
ab dhaee saal se bilkul kuchh nahin kar rahee hain
veena ke shabdon mein haan thee yahee bhaav samete ve ghar laut aae
unhen hostal mein daalakar ham indiya hee shipht ho jaenge
jaanatee ho main deharaadoon mein unake ghar maheenon raha hoon
pyaar se maan kee godee mein sir rakh kar aankhen band kar leen usane
abhee shurooaat hai mere doktaree jeevan kee
main to yahee praarthana karatee rahoongee ki aap hamesha tandurust rahen
aur sab sunakar priya ne chutakee lee sab baat to samajha gaee lekin aakhir mein apane lie mera saath paane ka bahaana badee chaalaakee se tumane taiyaar kar liya poochha priya ne
usee karaah ne veena kee neend mein vighn daala tha
veena ne dekha dev bujhasa gaya hai
dev ghar mein nahin tha
aisa bhee kya jeevan ki ve aaraam se so bhee nahin sakate
sab jaanate the ki kabhee kisee bhee din dev chala jaega sabase door
usaka kiya maintum ham sab saat janm bhee nahin utaar sakate
maan kee baat priya ko anyatha na lage use is baat kee bhee chinta thee
kisase kahata
mainne na to nahin kee thee bas apane duhkh kee baat kee thee
bas itanee see baat huee doktar saamant se
bas use hee dilaasa detee thee
sab khush ho jaenge
jaise bijalee ka karant chalane par bhee shareer apanee gati nahin pakad pa raha tha
ham mein se koee tum par jorajabaradastee nahin kar raha
sab meree aur dev kee jodee ko dekhadekh kar hee khushee se bhare hain
yadi yah shubh ka prateek hai to yah sab veena bhaabhee kee tapasya ka phal hai aur dhairy mein seva bhaav mein jindagee kee keemat ko samajhane mein mainne unhen apana guru maan liya hai
vah bhee rone lagee
vah sab samajh gae
vaheen ek chabootare par jaakar teenon baith gae
bachapan se sunatee thee geeta bhaav ko ki gunavaanon ke gunon ko dekho
lekin mujhase kuchh na poochho
samajhadaar to tha lekil usake man kee thaah nahin le pa raha tha
bahut achchha ladaka hai
varana rajanee vidaee ke baad hamen dillee mein milatee huee chalee jaegee
unhen buree nahin lagee yah baat ki ladake vaale baaraat lekar nahin aaenge
kuchh bhee nahin bolane kee sthiti mein tha
iseelie hee bechain tha vah
kab subah se shaam hotee hai pata hee nahee chalata
main to apane manobhaavon ko prakat kar rahee hoon
